titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on certain steam generators and certain reactor vessel heads for use in nuclear reactors.
To suspend temporarily the duty on certain steam generators and certain reactor vessel heads for use in nuclear reactors.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2012, the existing temporary duty suspension on certain steam generators and certain reactor vessel heads for use in nuclear reactors.
